data.title: Sleek and responsive
data.description: Looks amazing on all types of devices. User can switch between dark and light color modes.

data.title: Free and open source
data.description: Mockback is free for both personal and commercial purposes. You can extend the functionality by writing on top of our code base.

data.title: Knowledge network
data.description: Provide a platform to your users for sharing knowledge with each other.

data.title: Eliminate redundancy
data.description: With an open platform and state of the art machine learning, reduce the volume of similar issues that are already answered in the community.

data.title: Get customer insights
data.description: Mockback is not just a tool to help you with customer support. It also provides insights into the user issues with different statistics and community discussions about a topic.

data.title: Wiki for internal articles
data.description: Maintain your internal documentation with the Wiki module. Wiki module is accessible only to your employees and not for your users.
